description: Unique identifier for a specific web service method configuration used in integrations; primary key for the method record.
Identifier linking the method to its parent web service/application; foreign key that associates methods under the same service.
Human-readable description or name of the operation performed by the method, used for display, selection, and auditing.
Categorizes the method by data flow direction (inbound vs. outbound) to distinguish integrations that receive data from those that publish it.
